narrative.summary: Okta blocked a failed SSO authentication attempt for user jane.doe@acme.com which was explicitly flagged as a suspected threat.
narrative.why_it_matters: While the authentication failed, the 'threatSuspected' flag indicates Okta detected anomalous behavior (e.g., high velocity or bad reputation) originating from IP 203.0.113.44.

recommended_actions.title: Review User Activity
recommended_actions.rationale: Check for any successful logins for this user immediately before or after this event.

recommended_actions.title: Investigate Source IP
recommended_actions.rationale: Analyze IP 203.0.113.44 for historical malicious activity.
